circular economic system, this Standard relies on the identification of the physical flows of
resources, materials and products used and generated by the undertaking through Disclosure
Requirement E5-4 Resource inflows and Disclosure Requirement E5-5 Resource outflows.
Interactions with other ESRS
6. Resource use is a major driver of other environmental impacts such as climate change,
